If a bug '''is''' a translation error, you shall classify it as a translation bug by doing the '''following''':

1. Clicking on the '''"also affects project"''' link, choose the "ubuntu-translations" project.
2. '''Assign''' the bug to the '''"ubuntu-l10n-LANGUAGE"''' team, changing "LANGUAGE" for the affected language two letters ISO code.
